items.name: Introduction to Python
items.description: An introduction to Python programming basics, including how to write simple scripts and understand Python syntax.

items.name: Data Types and Variables
items.description: Learn about different data types in Python and how to use variables to store information.

items.name: Control Structures
items.description: Understand how to control the flow of your programs with conditionals and loops.

items.name: Functions and Modules
items.description: Dive into functions and modules to organize your Python code more effectively.

items.name: Exception Handling
items.description: Learn how to handle errors in your Python programs gracefully.

items.name: Working with Files
items.description: Explore file handling in Python to read from and write to files.

items.name: Introduction to Data Science
items.description: Get started with Data Science using Python and explore various libraries like Pandas and NumPy.

items.name: Data Visualization
items.description: Learn about data visualization techniques to represent information graphically.

content.title: Welcome to Python
content.description: Start your journey into Python programming with a solid foundation.

content.title: Understanding Data Types
content.description: Deep dive into Python's data types and learn how to manipulate them.

content.title: Mastering Control Structures
content.description: Gain control over the logic flow of your Python scripts.

content.title: Organizing Code with Functions
content.description: Learn how to write reusable pieces of code using functions.

content.title: Handling Exceptions
content.description: Understand how to catch and handle exceptions, preventing common errors.

content.title: File Operations
content.description: Master reading and writing files, a crucial skill for any Python programmer.

content.title: Data Science Basics
content.description: Explore the fundamentals of Data Science and how Python plays a crucial role.

content.title: Data Visualization
content.description: Learn to visualize data effectively to uncover patterns and insights.
